Each player has received one random item from the following deck - x2 AcmePaperweight, x1 UnlitDynamite

FlavourText: The day draws to a close...

Description: A nifty black spheroid with a slightly flattened base to keep any papers from flying away in the wind. It has 'ACME' embossed on the side and for some reason, it came with lots of warnings in the box. Warnings like 'do not shake' 'do not move suddenly' and 'keep away from other explosions'.

A nifty black spheroid with a slightly flattened base to keep any papers from flying away in the wind. It has 'ACME' embossed on the side and for some reason, it came with lots of warnings in the box. Warnings like 'do not shake' 'do not move suddenly' and 'keep away from other explosions'.

DetailedDescription: You hold the boom, and must decide on how long to set the fuse for. If you do not choose a fuse length, it will be chosen for you
The lit dynamite will then be passed to a random member on the opposite team
Choose when the dynamite goes boom:
You may select which faction to side with
You cannot swap sides once you make a decision
If you have not picked a side by the end of the game you will lose

FlavourText: Only a single star remains in the sky...

Message: Each player has received one random item from the following deck - x2 AvledaRune, x1 AltruisticTrinket

Description: A nifty black spheroid with a slightly flattened base to keep any papers from flying away in the wind. It has 'ACME' embossed on the side and for some reason, it came with lots of warnings in the box. Warnings like 'do not shake' 'do not move suddenly' and 'keep away from other explosions'.

An Avleda Rune allows you redirect all visits to a target player to yourself for one night. This includes item usage and item transfers. Holding it will make you appear as a Witch Craft user to intel checks. After use, a Rune must recharge and can be used again by you three nights later. If you pass the Rune to a different player they will be able to use it immediately.
